website_summaries.verdict: A safe, non-toxic finish, complimentary anti-tip kit, and a classic appeal make this option ideal for nurseries.
pros: Made of eco-friendly New Zealand pine wood
Dimensions are just right for use as a changing table
Metal gliders allow drawers to open and close smoothly
Features a drawer stop mechanism for improved safety
Included anti-tip kit is a nice touch
cons: Assembly can be time consuming and less-than-clear instructions don't make it any easier

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For $400 I expected real wood, however it is made of particleboard with a veneer. It does look good once assembled, but is overpriced. It's worth about $250, not $400. Assembly took a little while but I expected that since I was buying it online. Instructions aren't horrible but could be a little clearer. Overall, I didn't have too many issues putting it together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: MB139

customer_reviews.title: Please help!
customer_reviews.text: Please help! With the drawers fully extended open, there is only 7.5 inches of opening and another 7 inches deep into the drawer. This cant be right. Very difficult to get anything out of the drawer, if it's at the back. Looking for some help. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: brandon Porter

customer_reviews.title: and for the price it's rather sturdy and looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our little one's nursery as it's important for us to find a product that's not only Green Guard Certified, but is also aesthetically pleasing. It's simple design goes really well with the Babyletto Hudson crib we purchased, and for the price it's rather sturdy and looks expensive. It wasn't too difficult to construct (although my husband was the one putting it together and not me), and so far we've been really happy with it. Since it does come with white knobs, we opted to change those out for brushed nickel ones we purchased to give it a little pop of color to offset the white on white look.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This dresser took several hours to assemble and I’m good at that kind of thing. Hardware is very cheap and the drawers only slide maybe half the way out. But, it looks good. For the money it is very small and made of poor quality materials including particle board. This would be a five star review if it was half the price, but it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: Great as changing table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dresser for the price. I put the drawers together myself while pregnant, and my husband helped with the rest. It looks great and is very sturdy. We use the top as her changing table, and I like that it is long enough to hold all our changing supplies to the side of the changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Katya56

customer_reviews.title: Damaged - No response from MDB
customer_reviews.text: Please note this dresser is nowhere near the quality of the matching crib, which I also purchased for my granddaughter. The material is very cheap (worse than IKEA) and while the outside of the packaging appeared intact, two drawers were damaged. I completed the contact form on MDB's website and did not receive a response after waiting for six days. Do yourself a favor and pass on this item.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Purchase at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: After being more than halfway through putting this together. I noticed that some of the products are defective and cracked. This is unacceptable. I wish I would have never ordered this. I strongly urge you not to as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but took a very long time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but took a very long time to assemble. It wasn't necessarily difficult to assemble, but it was very time consuming. It also has a pretty strong smell that kind of reminds me of paint. The smell doesn't really bother me, but it's something to be aware of for those sensitive to smells. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Penner

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived undamaged and in a timely manner. Took my husband about 2.5-3 hours to set up. The changing tray that I bought for the top fits perfectly with some space on the side for diapers/wipes. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because the dresser is so expensive, it is sturdy but it is on the smaller side not sure if it's truly worth 400 dollars. But I am in love with how it looks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, missing pieces, used
customer_reviews.text: Dresser was obviously used or assembled previously. Came with lots of sloppily drilled holes and missing screws. Was able to assemble after purchasing more screws but it seems very flimsy/unstable. I'm disappointed because I bought a similar dresser from the same brand for our first baby, and that one was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Dresser
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is really pretty!!! Color is beautiful, parts did not come damaged and shipped fast! Works absolutely perfectly for our nursery!! Only con is that the dresser comes in pieces. It took about 2 hours to put together.. Also, dresser drawers aren’t as “deep” as I had hoped, but I’d still buy again! (Changing table topper and knobs bought separately)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor D.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dresser
customer_reviews.text: i love this dresser. the drawers open and close very smoothly. I didn't put it together, my husband did, but he said it was no harder than you would expect, whatever that means. haha
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hessenauer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is pretty difficult to assemble. Each drawer takes a while to do. The dresser and chestnut color is beautiful and it looks great. The drawers are a littler smaller then I expected though.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser for the price! Instructions were a little difficult. Pay attention to the smaller screws provided that are for the interior track. Took about 2-3 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with slate color
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little battered when arrived, but the contents inside were wrapped and secured. We bought the slate color and there were no markings or chips. Very easy to assemble, but definitely recommend an electric drill when putting the drawers together.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: The box came extremely beat up, with dents and holes in the box. Product was well packaged, so no damage to the wood. After assembly, the dresser feels a BIT wobbly, not rock solid like our Simmons dresser (for older child).
customer_reviews.author: NYAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Dresser space is severely lacking!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of the dresser but the drawers end up being SOOO small!!! baby girl is in newborn clothes and I can barely fit anything in there. I can only imagine how it’s going to be when she gets older. No way she’ll be able to use these dressers as a toddler :(
customer_reviews.author: SaraP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dresser to go with the Davinci Piedont crib and color matches perfectly. Beautiful for the price and easy to put together. 2 drawer fronts were scratched on arrival but contacted the company and replacement panels were here within a week with not one hassle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just change knobs
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser for our nursery. I found it on a website list that rated sturdiest, eco friendly, real wood, and budget friendly dressers. After searching far and wide I pulled the trigger and it was worth it. It’s great because you can just change the knobs and transform the dresser! I bought modern lucite and gold knobs from Anthropologie and it makes it look like a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Furniture that’s built quality
customer_reviews.text: This dresser as read previously is pre assembled in some areas incorrectly. Building any dresser is work on top of having to finish the whole build to see the manufacturer built in drawer glides (dresser drawer rails) 100% odd frame causing my husband to have to take apart and re drill drawer glides straight
customer_reviews.author: cozette pack

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My review is based solely on my experience building the dresser. It was difficult/time consuming to put together because none of the parts were labeled with letters. The shipment was also missing 5 screws which I had to go out and purchase myself.
customer_reviews.author: Fallswell

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality build!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wasn't convinced he wanted the gray, but I talked him into it! :) We both love the color! The drawers are a nice size, and the coordinating changing tray works well with the dresser. The construction is good quality with nice sliders for the drawers and solid wood build.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for nursery
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a baby's room. Pretty standard to put together. Think IKEA. Directions are pictures only. I'm 4 mos pregnant and put it together myself in an hour. We added the davinci changing table topper to the top. Drawers are more appropriate for a child's clothes than an adult due to depth.
customer_reviews.author: KatieKateP

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dresser for a nursery. Came in many, many pieces. The box looked like it had been through a war, but only a few minor imperfections on the dresser. And the white is pure white, not off-white.
customer_reviews.author: pandora1

customer_reviews.title: Appears this may have been a used dresser or used ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears this may have been a used dresser or used parts were placed in our set. Impossible to put together so far, screws are all stripped out!
customer_reviews.author: KSS House

customer_reviews.title: Twin Nursery Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our twin nursery since it provides 6 drawers. The drawer slides are quality and the piece as a whole is well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love these Davinci products. Some parts seem flimsy when putting it together but so far with my destructive toddler it’s held up amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this dresser
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser. I have a matching dresser that came with the changing table. We are now using it with this dresser because its lower and made the perfect height for a changing table for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tamariez

customer_reviews.title: Drawers are a problem
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend because the drawers do not extend all the way, so half of your clothes will be hidden underneath. I would like to return but nobody is responding to my request.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Dresser came damaged. Particle board had big chunk chipped off right in the front of the piece. However, once it was fully assembled it looked great and was relatively sturdy. I’ll call to get replacement piece where damaged. Overall not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dresser
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous dresser. We bought it to go with the DaVinci Autumn crib (also in Slate) and it looks *fabulous* in our son's nursery. Fairly easy assembly - not the greatest directions ever, but the pictures were enough to figure out what we needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the dresser. Smaller than expected. Still my favorite nursery item
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Heath

customer_reviews.title: well made and an excellent value. Not too difficult to put together either
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dresser as a gift for a family member. It is very solid, well made and an excellent value. Not too difficult to put together either. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my First grandson and my son and daughter in law love it
customer_reviews.author: Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler dresser
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Amazon had the most affordable price with Prime shipping. It looks fresh and modern while still very charming with the oversize knobs. Drawers slide well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Dresser falling apart after one year. Very cheap wood. . Drawers are falling and dangerous for a nursery. Wish I would have known how cheap this would b. Very disappointed in davinci
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dresser for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok dresser, scratches easily, wish it was a little tougher
customer_reviews.author: Polishspy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dresser, not too bad to put together as far as furniture assembly goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Riefenstahl

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! I changed out the knobs for wood ones and it make the dresser pop a little more! Overall great little simple dresser for my babies room and it was easy to build!
customer_reviews.author: Priya P.

customer_reviews.title: ... hard to put together but other than that we love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put together but other than that we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Craft

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser! Takes some time to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser! Takes some time to put together, but it's very beautiful once it's done! Seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser for my son's room! Well made and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: LFid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to put together .Instructions confusing but bed is terrific
customer_reviews.author: Barry H. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The drawers do not open correctly, do not buy. To expensive...
customer_reviews.author: Dariel

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have an electric screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: easy to follow instructions, well made, looks good when assembled. assembly takes about 1-2 hours. Electric screwdriver essential.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan L. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price but the most insane piece of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price but the most insane piece of furniture ever to put together. Nothing is labeled and the directions are even wrong on some parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keener

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value-- not easy to put together though! Lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: I have a fair amount of ikea furniture experience and the directions are about inline with those (little more confusing with the
customer_reviews.text: I did not think this unit was difficult to put together and it seems quite well made to me. I have a fair amount of ikea furniture experience and the directions are about inline with those (little more confusing with the screws at times but not difficult) and I feel it is much better quality. We purchased the DaVinci Autumn crib and I think they go together wonderfully. Exactly the slate color I wanted for a grey and aqua nursery.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Functional dresser for baby's room or any room !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a Baby Shower gift. She likes it and is using it as a dresser and changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Swisher

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be of good quality for baby furniture
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to set up it just takes patience. It seems to be of good quality for baby furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser but reeked
customer_reviews.text: Drawers slide easily; great height to double as changing table. Smelled like a LOT of chemicals when it arrived... concerning.
customer_reviews.author: eugene b

customer_reviews.title: Should have gone with IKEA
customer_reviews.text: The quality is terrible. I can't believe this is 400.00!! IKEA would have been way better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the look of the dresser
customer_reviews.text: Couple issues with the drawer pieces but replacement was sent. Like the look of the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser. It was a little difficult to put together but overall satisfied! Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: lacie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dresser! It's true white in color. My husband had no problems putting it together. The bottom of the drawers are nice and sturdy. Arrived without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Beth McBurney-Daly

customer_reviews.title: Wood scratches too easily- It's easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wood scratches too easily- It's easy to put together, but has flimsy drawers and poor craftsmanship. Returned the item back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ah

customer_reviews.title: This is a good dresser and changing table option.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good storage! Hard and long assembly and quality is not top but good.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Kim

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Dresser arrived damaged in 3 different spots; had to return.
customer_reviews.author: lopezgang234

customer_reviews.title: this is a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great quality product! I was hesitant to buy because the price seemed cheaper than everywhere else, but it came in perfect packaging and condition, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ducks_mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib- but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib... but when we opened the package and put it together we found numerous cracks, dents, and chips. For $400 it's not the condition. I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I guess it what should have been expected but after the crib assembly went so easy I didn't think this would be so challenging
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster to put together. I guess it what should have been expected but after the crib assembly went so easy I didn't think this would be so challenging. Definitely a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Product Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with quality. Product arrived damaged with a chunk of wood missing from the front edge of the top of dresser. Be prepared for a project assembling this dresser, and be sure to check all components for damage before getting to work putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Davinci Jayden 6-Drawer Double Wide Dresser in Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoSimply sophisticated, the Jayden 6-Drawer Double Dresser offers the optimal storage solution for any nursery or home. Pairing effortlessly with both the Jayden and Autumn Collection, the Jayden Double Dresser features the same transcending quality design. Made of durable New Zealand pine wood with new and improved metal drawer glide hardware and stop mechanism construction, Jayden provides a smooth and safe glide for long-lasting use through the years.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: 6 spacious drawers that can hold all the adorable baby clothes, blanket, and more. NEW AND IMPROVED with thicker drawer bottoms and additional corner blocks to make it sturdier and long-lasting

VERSATILE DESIGN: Changing station now. Big kid dresser later! This dresser is designed so that you can add a DaVinci changing tray (#M0619) to use as a convenient changing station during the baby years.

SMOOTH GLIDE: Pre-installed ball-bearing drawer glides that make opening the drawers easy even when your hands are full with baby; ROUNDED WOODEN KNOBS: This dresser features stylish, wooden knobs that are rounded to prevent injuries when your baby starts crawling and walking around

EASY ASSEMBLY: We've done the hardest part for you! Drawer glides come pre-assembled so that you can put your dresser together more quickly and start enjoying your nursery sooner; QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pinewood and TSCA compliant engineered wood -only the best for your baby

FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe. Rest assured knowing it exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards. Stop mechanism and anti-tip kit included for additional safety

specifications.Material Type: New Zealand Pine Wood and TSCA compliant MDF
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars130 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
